author: Ryan Turner
title: Surat Thani marks king’s birthday with beach, underwater clean-up
text: Surat Thani marks king’s birthday with beach, underwater clean-up [Government](https://thethaiger.com/hot-news/politics) officials in Surat Thani, in collaboration with the Koh Tao Subdistrict Municipality, organised a beach and underwater clean-up event to honour the birthday of King Maha Vajiralongkorn Phra Vajiraklaochaoyuhua on July 28. Yesterday, July 18, at the Chulalongkorn Stone Court in [Koh Tao](https://maps.app.goo.gl/wTAq9Ct5qFthW4AT7), Pha Ngan district, Surat Thani province, several officials and local leaders, including the Deputy Director of the Provincial Fisheries Department, Natthaphon Sinpunphol, and Watcharin Farsiriporn, Mayor of Koh Tao Subdistrict Municipality, participated in the event. The initiative was part of a larger effort spanning 22 provinces to celebrate the king’s 72nd birthday, an important milestone in Thai culture. The beach [clean-up](https://thethaiger.com/tag/clean-up) efforts saw participation from various sectors, including government officials, private sector representatives, local organisations, community leaders, teachers, and students from the Koh Tao area. The activities included collecting litter from the [beaches](https://thethaiger.com/tag/beach) and diving to remove underwater debris around Koh Tao. This island is renowned for its vibrant marine life and coral reefs, attracting many [tourists](https://thethaiger.com/hot-news/tourism) who come to enjoy its underwater beauty, reported KhaoSod. The event not only celebrated the king’s birthday but also aimed to raise awareness about environmental conservation. The clean-up efforts are crucial for maintaining the habitats of various marine species and ensuring that Koh Tao remains a popular and pristine diving destination. Participants were seen working diligently, with divers venturing into the waters to collect rubbish that had settled on the sea floor. The community’s collective effort highlighted the shared responsibility in protecting the nation’s natural resources. The beach clean-up efforts served as a reminder of the ongoing need for environmental stewardship and the vital role that each individual plays in preserving the beauty and health of Thailand’s natural landscapes. In [ other news](https://thethaiger.com/news/national/thai-king-honoured-for-vital-contribution-to-covid-19-fight), King Maha Vajiralongkorn Phra Vajiraklaochaoyuhua demonstrated his generosity through substantial support for medical personnel battling the [Covid-19](https://thethaiger.com/coronavirus) pandemic. To celebrate his birthday, the king is being honoured for his vital contributions to medical science and public health, which have become crucial amidst the pandemic. [Thailand News](https://thethaiger.com/news/national)

author: 自由時報電子報
title: 發送物資兼訪視 屏縣創新關懷模式
text:
發送物資兼訪視 屏縣創新關懷模式
東港興和社區發展協會結合關懷據點和物資銀行。（記者陳彥廷攝）
〔記者陳彥廷／屏東報導〕為強化弱勢家庭物資援助，屏東縣政府結合民間慈善團體成立「物資銀行」，其中東港鎮興和社區的幸福物資銀行，透過社區據點日常活動與志工訪視，成為全台唯一創新物資服務據點，精準掌握在地獨居長者與弱勢家庭的需求，讓物資發送不再只是「配送」服務，更是一場從頭了解長者需求的社會關懷行動。
去年10月開辦 創社福全人服務模式
縣府社會處表示，興和社區關懷據點是全國第一個將物資銀行服務與社區關懷結合的據點，去年十月由縣府、興和社區發展協會及社團法人高雄市慈善團體聯合總會承辦成立，透過社區熟悉的人脈網絡與日常互動，藉由精準評估長輩需求，提供營養品或生活物資，讓物資能更貼近實際需求，避免資源重複與浪費，讓屏東的社會福利全人服務模式更綿密。
社區發展協會理事長顏陳珍霞說，早期捐贈物資時，若不符長者需求，可能就一直放到過期，因此送物資要「送到人心裡」，有些長者不好意思開口，就由前往家訪的志工調查需求，再送社會處備查，據點志工的熱情，就是她最大的動力。
志工快遞送物資 據點成長者生活重心
走進「銀行」，各式物資在社區志工分門別類下井然有序，不只食品，還有小家電或居家清潔用具。顏陳珍霞說，有的獨老連出門都困難，由志工擔任快遞送物資，關懷據點已成長者日常。
六十七歲的老翁曾阿順說，起初他對申請物資感到不好意思，看到社工熱心探訪後，也鼓起勇氣提出申請，感謝縣府幫助，讓物資更加周到；八十三歲、擔任志工的蘇姓阿嬤說，關懷據點就像她第二個家，很開心還有能力幫助別人。
屏東社會處表示，東港興和社區物資銀行具有「公私協力、深入在地、深耕關懷」的特色，展現出物資服務結合社區據點的最佳實踐教材，未來將評估其他社區據點導入特色模式，讓物資銀行真正走入人群、送得更準，落實社會安全網。
透過社區據點日常活動與志工訪視，成為全台唯一創新物資服務據點。（記者陳彥廷攝）

author: @jordan__french
title: Teklium Shares Its Best-Kept Secret: A New Platform Where Creators Actually Win - Grit Daily News
text:
Content creators reign supreme in today’s digital world, driving trends and shaping culture with vogue ideas and engaging content. From viral videos to chart-topping music, the internet has become a playground for talent, offering limitless opportunities for individuals to share their creations with the world.
Yet, behind this seemingly democratized ecosystem lies a complex web of challenges that often leave creators struggling to reap the full rewards of their labor. Numerous layers of intermediaries and platforms take a significant cut of earnings, and the threat of unauthorized use and piracy frequently leaves creators shortchanged and vulnerable.
But what if there was a new platform that changes how creators share their content — one that’s truly safe and financially beneficial? This is what California-based technology company Teklium is delivering with its new content creation platform , EQC One.
EQC One, founded by Jason Ho, aims to transform online interactions between content creators and digital talents. The platform seeks to create a more equitable and progressive internet environment. It empowers creators by confirming they receive proper recognition and fair compensation, while also protecting their content.
Content Creation: What is the Problem? The need for EQC One stems from the inherent problems plaguing the current content creation field. While the internet has undoubtedly democratized content creation, it has also introduced challenges that undermine the value and integrity of creators’ work.
Many creators lose up to 70% or more of their earnings to platform fees, with multiple layers of platforms, distributors, and intermediaries taking a significant portion of the profits. Moreover, the widespread availability also risks their work being duplicated and misused without permission.
Teklium recognizes these challenges and aims to find a solution with EQC One. The platform is built on a vision of a progressive internet that prioritizes creators and younger generations over dominant entities. Ho explains, “The internet should be a place where talent thrives without interference from algorithms or exploitation by larger players. EQC One is our way of giving creators the tools they need to succeed on their own terms.”
The Solution: How EQC One Works EQC One operates on a foundation of inventive technologies and principles designed to build a secure and equitable ecosystem for content creation. At its core, the platform utilizes a secure proprietary digital currency to facilitate all transactions within the network. This currency is the exclusive medium of exchange for content sales, subscriptions, and other services on EQC One.
Ho explains that service providers, such as content distributors, earn this digital money through certified Proof of Work (PoW) contributions, which validate their efforts in delivering content and maintaining the platform’s infrastructure.
EQCertificate is a security feature for EQC One. It certifies transactions and validates PoWs for server providers. This mechanism certifies integrity and trust in all interactions on the platform.
This establishes a secure and transparent environment where creators can confidently transact and share their content without fear of fraud or manipulation. Ho explains, “In every transaction, EQCertificate verifies the identity of senders and receivers within the EQC One network. Verifying confirms data integrity and protection from cyberattacks like eavesdropping, interception, and forging. It guarantees security for data flows over the network.”
A Platform Designed with Creators in Mind EQC One is more than just a transactional platform; it’s a haven for creators seeking financial independence and security for their work. Charging only 0.5% on transactions allows content providers to retain 99.5% of their earnings, a stark contrast to traditional platforms that take significant cuts from creators’ revenues.
The platform also prohibits algorithms from filtering or unfairly promoting content, relying instead on transparent metrics like downloads, ratings, or recommendations from trusted critics. This method makes certain that merit determines visibility rather than opaque algorithms that often favor more prominent players.
Moreover, EQC One enforces strict identity verification for all users to eliminate anonymity-driven issues like trolling or unauthorized content usage. This policy fosters accountability while removing the need for censorship, a principle central to Teklium’s vision of an open yet secure internet.
EQC One also introduces its read-once function, which certifies content from photos, videos, music, or any artwork that can only be accessed once, regardless of the number of copies that may exist online or offline. Ho mentions that after a single read, all other copies of the data become invalid, rendering them unusable. This clever feature gives creators unparalleled control over their content, preventing unauthorized duplication and distribution while enabling creators to keep full control over who they authorize to access their work.
Ho emphasizes, “Creators pour their hearts into their craft. With EQC One, we’re giving them a space where their talent is respected and rewarded fairly.”
Start of New Era in Content Creation Teklium recognizes the power of content creation and its ability to shape culture and society. EQC One eliminates the barriers that hinder safe and rewarding content creation, and replaces it with a platform where talent can shine without exploitation.
Ho and the whole EQC One team look forward to unlocking a new era of creativity and innovation. Ho believes that EQC One can open new opportunities for professionals across industries, allowing them to exchange ideas, services, inventions, and products that will benefit both content creators and audiences.

author: Agencia EFE
title: Joe Biden expresa su confianza en Kamala Harris: “Está cualificada para ser presidenta”
text: [1](/deporte-total/colombia/gol-caracol-en-vivo-donde-ver-colombia-vs-uruguay-en-senal-caracol-tv-gratis-futbol-libre-tv-gol-play-online-por-copa-america-2024-video-co-noticia/) [Saber más](https://elcomercio.pe/buenas-practicas/) / NoticiasInformación basada en hechos y verificada de primera mano por el reportero, o reportada y verificada por fuentes expertas. | Informativo El presidente de [Estados Unidos](https://elcomercio.pe/mundo/eeuu/), [Joe Biden](https://elcomercio.pe/noticias/joe-biden/), expresó este jueves su confianza en la vicepresidenta, [Kamala Harris](https://elcomercio.pe/noticias/kamala-harris/), afirmando que no la habría elegido como su compañera de fórmula en las elecciones de 2020 si no estuviera convencido de que podría ejercer el cargo de la Presidencia “desde el principio”. “No la habría elegido si no hubiera pensado que estaba cualificada para ser presidenta desde el principio. No me ando con rodeos en eso. Ella está cualificada para ser presidenta”, afirmó el mandatario en una rueda de prensa en los márgenes de la cumbre de la OTAN en Washington. MIRA AQUÍ: [Biden tiene otro lapsus y presenta a Zelensky como “presidente Putin” en cumbre de la OTAN | VIDEO] Harris suena como la única opción viable si Biden se viera obligado a retirarse de la contienda a estas alturas de la campaña, a un mes de la convención del partido demócrata, debido a las dudas sobre su edad (81 años) y su capacidad para renovar un mandato de cuatro años en noviembre. En la esperada rueda de prensa, la primera en solitario desde noviembre, Biden alabó a su vicepresidenta, que en ante una hipotética incapacidad del mandatario asumiría el poder. “Ha manejado temas de libertad de los cuerpos de la mujeres y el control de sus cuerpos muy bien. Segundo, ha mostrado capacidad de manera casi cualquier tema. Es una dura fiscal. Es una sola frase: es muy buena”, insistió Biden. MÁS INFORMACIÓN: [Cómo Biden gana tiempo mientras enfrenta más llamados a abandonar su candidatura a la reelección] Las encuestas tras en debate presidencial del 27 de junio contra el republicano Donald Trump dan una mayor ventaja a Kamala Harris en una hipotético enfrentamiento electoral en noviembre si Biden se retirase por las presiones de algunos miembros de su partido. El mal desempeño del mandatario en ese cara a cara elevó las dudas sobre su capacidad de vencer a Trump en noviembre y de seguir en el poder un segundo mandato, que finalizaría a los 86 años. Biden ha rechazado retirarse y aseguró hoy de nuevo que es el mejor posicionado para vencer a Trump. Agencia EFE es una agencia de noticias internacional española que distribuye información a más de dos mil medios de comunicación en todo el mundo en los soportes de prensa escrita, radio, televisión e internet. Cuenta con una red con más de tres mil periodistas de 60 nacionalidades. Opera 24 horas al día desde al menos, 180 ciudades de 110 países. Contenido GEC

author: Reuters
title: Le temps doux et la production record en 2023 pèsent lourdement sur les stocks de gaz naturel - 29/12/2023 à 18:36 - Boursorama
text:
29 décembre - ** Une production record, des stocks abondants et des conditions météorologiques relativement clémentes en 2023 ont pesé lourdement sur les actions des entreprises de gaz naturel NGA/
** Les contrats à terme sur le gaz naturel NGc1 , qui ont chuté de 43,7 % cette année, devraient terminer l'année avec la plus forte baisse en pourcentage depuis 2006 (Full Story )
** Les prix de la matière première ont fortement chuté, passant de ~10 $ par mmBtu l'année dernière à ~2,51 $ par mmBtu en 2023
** Les actions de Linde Plc ont surperformé leurs pairs et ont augmenté de ~25,5 % depuis le début de l'année après avoir régulièrement dépassé les estimations de bénéfices
** Cheniere Energy LNG.A , Energy Transfer ET.N , EQT Corp
EQT.N et CNX Resources CNX.N ont gagné entre 14 % et 19,2 % depuis le début de l'année
** Les sociétés de GNL Sempra SRE.N et New Fortress NFE.O ont chuté de 3,7 % et 10,6 %, respectivement, depuis le début de l'année
** Tellurian TELL.A a perdu près de 53% en cumul annuel après avoir lutté pour recruter des investisseurs pour la première phase du projet Driftwood LNG et avoir évincé son président et cofondateur Charif Souki
** Les ETF United States Natural Gas Fund UNG.P et ProShares Ultra Bloomberg Natural Gas BOIL.P ont perdu respectivement 63,8 % et 91,8 % depuis le début de l'année

author: TheShortSwede Community
title: Mike Johnson's Christian Nationalism
text: From The Guardian 12 .23.23 House speaker’s Christian nationalist ties spark first amendment fears Links between the new Republican House speaker, Mike Johnson, and key Christian nationalist leaders have sparked fears the devout Louisiana congressman might seek to erode elements of the first amendment, which protects key US civil liberties including freedom of religion and the separation of church and state. Long before the evangelical conservative Johnson became speaker, he had forged close ties with Christian nationalists like David Barton, whose writings claiming the country’s founders intended to create a Christian nation have been widely debunked by religion scholars. Although Barton, a self-styled historian, has been heavily criticized for distorting the first amendment by promoting the flawed idea there should be no separation between church and state, Johnson has hailed him as an important mentor and Barton has returned the praise. www.theguardian.com/… From Politico 10.27.23 ‘He Seems to Be Saying His Commitment Is to Minority Rule’ Kristin Kobes Du Mez, is a historian who specializes in evangelical Christianity and politics. The idea that America is founded on a creed is a common one among evangelicals, and it was a sign to her that Johnson adheres to a worldview that can be described as Christian nationalist. “As he understands it, this country was founded as a Christian nation. So really, Christian supremacy and a particular type of conservative Christianity is at the heart of Johnson’s understanding of the Constitution and an understanding of our government,” Du Mez says. www.politico.com/… From SLPC (Southern Poverty Law Center) 11.2.23 Hate Groups Rejoice Over Newly Elected Speaker Mike Johnson In his tenure as a congressman, Johnson has pushed xenophobic rhetoric and policies. His elevation to the speaker’s chair was lauded by anti-immigrant hate groups. Some of Johnson’s statements on immigration mimic “great replacement”-style rhetoric. The “great replacement” is a false and racist conspiracy theory purporting that white people are being intentionally displaced by ‘elites’ and replaced by immigrant people of color. Johnson has repeatedly accused Democrats of encouraging immigration to secure a supportive voting base. In a July 2021 appearance on Fox News, Johnson accused the Biden administration of allowing migrants into the country to expand the party’s voting base. “Why in the world would any elected official in this country go along with this terrible policy? This dangerous set of policies that they’re engaging in? You’re always drawn to that ultimate conclusion: They want to turn these people into voters,” Johnson said. www.splcenter.org/...

author: Thaís Campos
title: Hotel investe em neutralizador de ar para combater o coronavírus | SEGS Portal Nacional de Seguros, Saúde, Info, Ti, Educação
text:
Garantir a segurança dos clientes é ação primordial dos estabelecimentos comerciais para um retorno gradativo das atividades diante do atual momento de saúde do país. Quando o assunto é turismo, que espera ter uma retomada ainda mais forte com a chegada do verão, os hotéis estão investindo além do básico (máscara, álcool em gel e tapete sanitizante) para que funcionários e hóspedes fiquem tranquilos e sem problemas nesta pandemia. O Vila Selvagem, por exemplo, que fica em Fortim (CE), adquiriu uma tecnologia australiana recém-chegada ao Brasil que auxilia no combate de doenças respiratórias e alérgicas e tem potencial comprovado, por meio de laudo da Unicamp, de eliminar até 99,99% da contaminação por coronavírus.
O equipamento é um neutralizador de ar denominado Oxira. Ele reproduz os efeitos germicidas da luz solar, sem química e/ou radiação exposta, a partir da luz ultravioleta. Para liberar ar descontaminado, é dotado de lâmpada de mercúrio de baixa pressão, que produz radiação segura para humanos.
No hotel Vila Selvagem, o Oxira foi instalado logo na recepção, local de bastante circulação de pessoas. “Era muito importante para nós ter esse sistema para manter nossos clientes, mas também garantir tranquilidade e segurança aos nossos funcionários. O neutralizador de ar permite que o local com ar-condicionado se mantenha limpo e livre de contaminação”, afirma o proprietário Celian Chaufour. Ele ainda reforça que optou pelo equipamento australiano pela sua facilidade – como ser pequeno e ajustável ao ambiente –, pelo preço acessível e por causa dos benefícios que promovem o bem-estar de todos.
